scripts.prepare: rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install --ignore-scripts && webpack --config scripts/webpack.config.js scripts/postinstall.js ../src/lib/postinstall.js && cd ../src && rm -rf node_modules/ package-lock.json && npm i && cd ..
scripts.end2end:demo: cd ../demo && rm -rf hooks/ node_modules/ platforms/ package-lock.json && npm run build.plugin && npm i && npm run build-android-bundle && npm run build-ios-bundle && tns test android --justlaunch && tns test ios --emulator --justlaunch
scripts.end2end:demo-ng: cd ../demo-angular && rm -rf hooks/ node_modules/ platforms/ package-lock.json && npm run build.plugin && npm i && npm run build-android-bundle
scripts.end2end: npm run prepare && npm run end2end:demo && npm run end2end:demo-ng
scripts.changelog:add: git add ../CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(changelog): Updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release:pre: cd ../src && npm run clean && npm run test && cd .. && npm run end2end
scripts.release:post: npm run changelog && npm run changelog:add
scripts.release:major: npm run release:pre && npm version major && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:pre && npm version minor && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:pre && npm version patch && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run version-and-push
scripts.version-and-push: git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run merge-and-publish
scripts.premerge-and-publish: git checkout master && git merge develop
scripts.merge-and-publish: mv ../README.md .&& mv ../LICENSE . && npm publish && git reset --hard && git clean -f
